Posts.EditableText:
I seem to be having a problem when I host a server I cant connect with the normal progrma so that I can play and host at the same time it says

Requesting login from ID 1 ...
ID 1: Logged in as ac
ID 1: Successfully connected as 'ac'
ID 1: disconnected.
ID 1: Error outputting data 'Player removed

then I get a run time error on the client anyone know why this is and how I can host my own server and connect?
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
This is what the client says...

Run-time error '401': 
Can't show non-modal form when modal form is displayed
Posts.HTML:
This is what the client says...

Run-time error '401':
Can't show non-modal form when modal form is displayed

Posts.EditableText:
There is a bug that means this error occurs when logins and the welcomemsg are enabled.

In QDK, go to Game Properties, and on the QuestNet tab turn off the "server welcome message".

If you're using ASL, set "welcome off" in the "define options" block.
Posts.HTML:

If you're using ASL, set "welcome off" in the "define options" block.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks I got that one to work thank god for wordpad
